attributes.action: Force the UK Government to accept that animals are sentient beings

attributes.background: The UK government has voted to reject the inclusion of animal sentience in the European Union Withdrawal Bill despite vast research supporting it. Under EU law, animals are currently recognized as being capable of feeling pain and emotion. The new UK bill should acknowledge this fact also
